About Me

Cyber Security Specialist, Programmer, Yo-Yo Enthusiast.

BIO

Currently employed as an IT service desk engineer. I am a highly driven individual with a strong work ethic. On top of my full-time work schedule, I am also studying cybersecurity full-time at Arapahoe Community College. I expect to graduate by Spring 2023 with CCNA and Security+ certifications. I hope to work as a network security specialist in the near future.
